DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : - To describe subject vaccinate 3 dos HEXAVAC® 3 dos INFANRIX®-HEXA first two year life percentage subject anti-HBs antibody titre ≥10 mIU/mL 1 month booster dose either HBVaxPRO® 5 µg Engerix B® 10 µg . Secondary objective : - Additional immunogenicity assessment - Standard safety assessment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Anamnestic Immune Response Healthy 4 7 Year-old Children After Primary Vaccination Series With Either HEXAVAC® INFANRIX®-HEXA
